channel.title: Need help making it so you need client to connect
channel.description: i was hoping you guys would know of a way to make it so that you need the client to connecting to the server. im using: ddsspeced source project fubergen 7.3 client

item.title: Need help making it so you need client to connect
item.dc:creator: @holidayscape holidayscape
item.description:
@holidayscape wrote:

i know how to make it so that it will connect. What i want is so that you require the client to connect. So that it wont allow cheatclients etc. to connect.
